src:
West Java Festival 2019 Digelar di Bandung, Lalui Akhir Pekan dengan Semaraknya Parade Budaya
01 Nov 2019, 11:59 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR).- Sejumlah musisi ibu kota seperti Gigi, Isyana Sarasvati, Dewi Gita, Yura Yunita, dan sejumlah musisi asal Kota Bandung memeriahkan West Java Festival 2019 yang diselenggarakan di Gedung Sate mulai Jumat 1 November 2019 hingga Minggu 3 Nobember 2019.
Pada hari pertama West Java Festival 2019, Isyana Sarasvati mengisi panggung utama di Jalan Diponegoro, Kota Bandung.
Pada West Java Festival 2019, panitia menyediakan tiga panggung di kawasan Gedung Sate yang terletak di depan lobi, sisi barat timur Gedung Sate, serta panggung utama di Jalan Diponegoro.
Sejak Jumat pagi saat pembukaan, warga sudah mulai mengunjungi West Java Festival 2019. Aneka area tersedia mulai urban area, area kopi, kuliner, fashion, dan keunggulan dari 27 kota/kabupaten di Jabar, dan OPD serta BUMD Jabar.
Dalam ajang tahunan pemerintah provinsi Jawa Barat itu, ditampilkan beraneka ragam busana tradisional khas peserta dari berbagai kabupaten/kota se-Jabar. Tak hanya itu, berbagai produk unggulan dan komoditas asli Jawa Barat turut ditampilkan.
"Ada 262 booth, masyarakat Jabar juga bisa menikmati West Java Festival ini karena rangkaiannya sangat bagus, para penyedia jasa juga terlibat di sini. Diharapkan, membuahkan hasil transaksi ekonomi yang ada di Jabar," ucap Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan Jabar Dedi Taufik usai pembukaan West Java Festival 2019.
Ada sekira 44.000 pengunjung yang terdata melalui pendaftaran digital. Diharapkan, dalam waktu tiga hari, gelliat pariwisata di Jawa Barat meningkat.
Dengan mengedapankan sajian berbasis kebudayaan, kata Dedi, diharapkan kegiatan ini dapat meningkatkan rasa cinta dan kebanggaan masyarakat terhadap budaya di Jabar.
WJH 2019 juga menghadirkan talenta terbaik Jabar dan hiburan masyarakat dengan konten kubudayaan multietnis yang dikemas dengan mengikuti perkembangan zaman.
"Kemudian juga karnaval diikuti 27 kabupaten/kota di Jabar dan 20 OPD yang ada di Jabar dengan tema keanekarsgaman budaya, etnik Sunda-Betawi, Kecirebonan, dan Priayangan," katanya.
Dedi berharap ajang yang diselenggarakan Bidang Pemasaran Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan Provinsi Jawa Barat itu dapat menambah semaraknya kunjungan wisatawan nusantara dan mancanegara.***

Baca Juga
text:
West Java Festival 2019 Held in Bandung, Through the Weekend with the Vibrant Cultural Parade
01 Nov 2019, 11:59 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR) .- A number of capital city musicians such as Gigi, Isyana Sarasvati, Dewi Gita, Yura Yunita, and a number of musicians from the City of Bandung enlivened the West Java 2019 Festival which was held in Gedung Sate from Friday 1 November 2019 to Sunday 3 Nobember 2019.
On the first day of the 2019 West Java Festival, Isyana Sarasvati filled the main stage on Jalan Diponegoro, Bandung City.
At the 2019 West Java Festival, the committee provided three stages in the Gedung Sate area located in front of the lobby, east west side of Gedung Sate, and the main stage on Jalan Diponegoro.
Since Friday morning at the opening, residents have started visiting the West Java Festival 2019. Various areas are available starting from urban areas, coffee areas, culinary, fashion, and excellence from 27 cities / districts in West Java, and OPD and BUMD West Java.
In the annual event of the West Java provincial government, displayed a variety of traditional clothing typical of participants from various districts / cities throughout West Java. Not only that, various superior products and native commodities of West Java were also displayed.
"There are 262 booths, the people of West Java can also enjoy this West Java Festival because the series is very good, service providers are also involved here. Hopefully, it will produce economic transactions in West Java," said Head of the West Java Tourism and Culture Office Dedi Taufik after opening West Java Festival 2019.
There are approximately 44,000 visitors recorded through digital registration. It is expected, within three days, the tourism gelliat in West Java will increase.
By establishing a culture-based dish, said Dedi, it is hoped that this activity can increase people's love and pride for culture in West Java.
WJH 2019 also presents West Java's best talents and community entertainment with multi-ethnic cultural content that is packed with the times.
"Then the carnival was also followed by 27 regencies / cities in West Java and 20 DPOs in West Java with the theme of cultural diversity, Sundanese-Betawi ethnicity, Kecirebonan, and Priayangan," he said.
Dedi hopes that the event organized by the Marketing and Tourism Office of the West Java Province can increase the excitement of domestic and foreign tourist visits. ***
